name: Puzzle (twilightrh)
description:
This can be a game about Prediction and/or multitasking

You can only shoot after you move because you have to reload

Controls Desktop
  • WASD to move
  • ARROW to shoot
  • SHIFT to go back
  • right click on enemy to see their movements(you can choose to not do that to add extra difficulty
Mobile
  • WASD(Buttons) to move
  • ULDR(Buttons) to shoot
  • SHIFT(Button) to go back
  • hold enemy to see their movements(you can choose to not do that to add extra difficulty

Check out my other games if you liked this one!
